title: Modern Hotel with Easy Access to Central Pamplona
description: Wander through narrow alleys and embrace local traditions during your stay at Holiday Inn Express Pamplona, an IHG Hotel. Famous for the Running of the Bulls festival in July, this cobblestoned city has plenty to offer year-round, including the medieval Pamplona Cathedral, the captivating Museum of Navarra, and the famous San Nicol√°s and San Gregorio streets. After your busy day exploring Pamplona, return to the hotel for a relaxing beer or cocktail in the chic Lobby bar.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Pamplona, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Area Comercial Galaria Calle R 111 Mutilva, Pamplona, 31192 Spain
